alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Collier. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain of 1 to 2 inches have fallen from the earlier thunderstorms. This amount of rainfall will take sometime to drain away from the area. Therefore, the Flood Advisory will remain in effect until 7:30 PM EDT this evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Vineyards, Golden Gate, North Naples, Naples Park, East Naples and Pelican Bay. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
